title: Telegram cheklovlari - Telegram Info
description: Har doim zamonaviy Telegram cheklovlari {% year%}. Xabar uzunligiga cheklovlar, to'plamdagi stikerlar soni, Bot API-da xabarlarning chastotasi, ishtirokchilar soni, tahrirlash cheklovlari, faylning maksimal hajmi va boshqalar.
article_p1: Just like any other service, Telegram uses limits to ensure that users follow Fair Usage Policy and to keep the service running.
article_p2: This table lists the currently known Telegram limits and is being kept up to date.
